name: REVERSE (E9studios)
description:
Hello, This is my new game called "REVERSE". This was a game created for the GAM JAME game jam and is my first offical game jam. 

READ>>>

to play you will have to solve puzzels with your rewind feature. Press O and every physics body will reverse from how it fell or was moved. This leads to puzzle solving.

PLEASE NOTE:

game did blue screen and many levels were deleted sadly but it works fine just is short.

also if it dosent look like anything is happing when you press O just keep holding it

first offical game jam, im a very young developer and wanted to try a jam
